channel.title: G. Willow Wilson on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in G. Willow Wilson on jverkamp.com

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 10: Time and Again
item.description: A weirdly weak ending. It felt like they were building up to so much more… but this is the end of this particular run. I suppose it’s time to find out where/what is next. Comics are confusing yo. One Night Only Sleepover! Of course things go wrong. Over and over again. And thenâ€¦ Right. Itâ€™s about time. A cute story. Short though. The Ratio SCIENCE time with Bruno! You know, given that Ms.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 9: Teenage Wasteland
item.description:
Teenage Wasteland

Ironic that.

A whole Ms. Marvel story about when itâ€™s all too much and Kamala steps down.

Itâ€™s such a cute story. Some friends step up to (try) to take her place. Some (try to) track her down â€¦ for a sandwich. Itâ€™s what friendship is about.

Oh. And somehow the Inventor is back. But thatâ€™s not really the point now, is it?

I really liked this one.

Something New

Baby!

But thatâ€™sâ€¦ totally only the first few pages. After that, we get Bruno back (for a visit? Or more?), a new kid at schoolâ€¦ that can crush lockers with her bare hands, and oh so much relationship drama.

Itâ€™s a good time.

I wonder of Bruno shows up in any Black Panther issues while he was there.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 8: Mecca
item.description: Mecca K.I.N.D.â€”or anything butâ€”is in town. Rounding up anyone that â€˜doesnâ€™t look like they belongâ€™. ðŸ˜ƒ No, not quite like that. Itâ€™s a good one. Northeast Corridor And thenâ€¦ People are good at ignoring things, but even thatâ€™s a bit obviousâ€¦ A cute enough story though.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 7: Damage Per Second
item.description: Election Day Politics! Get out and vote! Man single issues are short. Damage Per Second Troll! Or computer virus. Close enough. Ready to reveal all the big bad secrets of the world. Sometimes people are clueless. But sometimes Zoe is right on. Sheâ€™s a fun side character. Itâ€™s a cute story. Expected weird/sappy solution. So it goes. Meanwhile in Wakanda And as an aside, Bruno! In Wakanda! Thatâ€™s a fun one.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 6: Civil War II
item.description:
High school athletic competition! New Jersey vs New York! Kamala vsâ€¦

Miles? Oh my.

Havenâ€™t seen him for a while…

So that went well.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 5: Super Famous
item.description:
Andâ€¦ swap. Continued volume numbering, new issue numbers. Same writer, new artists.

Onward!

Whoa, wait a minute. Less onward. More context!

Okay, so six months have passed. And itâ€™s not just we the readers who missed everythingâ€”apparently Kamalaâ€™s been flaking hard as well.

lol.

Also, Tyesha!

Which makes everything even more super busy! So of courseâ€¦

Yup. Bad idea.

So good.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 4: Last Days
item.description:
The worldâ€¦ is ending.

Or at least thatâ€™s how it feels.

Didnâ€™t she know him for likeâ€¦ a couple days? I suppose itâ€™s not that unusual. First times are so much bigger.

But still.

Bigger problems.

Also, the dream team up!

Itâ€™s fun and exactly the sort of thing Kamala dreamt about! Even if the scale of it allâ€¦ doesnâ€™t really make sense. The end of the world looms and theyâ€™re starting with the looting?

But getting to the part of the story we saw in the show? â€œI know.â€ Thatâ€™s the story Iâ€™m interested in!

A chaotic delightful mess of a story.

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 3: Crushed
item.description:
â€¦

Well. As far as hooks go, that is most certainly one of them.

Pity itâ€™s only got one volume.

Other than that we get the introduction of Kamranâ€”instant meetcute with Kamala, what can possibly go wrongâ€”inhuman strife, andâ€¦ a S.H.I.E.L.D. crossover?

Looks fun. Maybe Iâ€™ll read that one next.

Anyways, everything feels like itâ€™s flying by, in the way of comics. It takes too long to illustrate an entire volume, so everything gets crammed together.

Onward!

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 2: Generation Why
item.description:
You know all those rumors about pet alligators flushed down the sewers?

Yeah, they generally fail to mention the freakin laser beams.

Comics are weird. Volume 2 and weâ€™re already with the crossovers (hallucinatory Avengers donâ€™t count). So many crossovers. But theyâ€™re cute! And itâ€™s still mostly Ms. Marvel calling the shots.

A solid volume 2! Onward!

item.title: Ms. Marvel, Vol. 1: No Normal
item.description:
Ms. Marvel! I watched the TV show, so this should be about the same right?

Right?

Wellâ€¦ things get weird. Mostly due to an origin not entirely in the movies. So itâ€™s a bit different.

But the feel?

Itâ€™s still street level, teen girl, dealing with being from a Pakistani family/Muslim born in America.

Itâ€™s a fun start!
